Hope Water New Zealand

Website

Details

Hope Water is a small but essential New Zealand charity. Dedicated to fundraising to bridge the gaps for groups of people who are currently falling through the government‚Äôs grid of financial support. Hope Water needed a platform to sell their water bottles and accept donations.

I immediately began setting up their own Shopify site where they can sell their products, handle shipping, and manage their clients with ease.
